name: A Duck on Wheels Part 2: Wheelectric Duckaloo
name_original: A Duck on Wheels Part 2: Wheelectric Duckaloo
description:
A  Duck on wheels 2 is my entry for the  second round of the GDKO for 2023.

I had so much fun with the first one that I've decided to keep this going. :)

Controls

Left Arrow - Move left

Right Arrow - Move right

Space - Jump

Up Arrow - Interact

Credits: Images

This game & the previous one were constructed using stock images from the following creators:
